duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop workplace wellbeing strategies that align with organizational objectives and measure employee wellbeing.
Manage crisis management procedures in partnership with relevant teams and external constituents.
Collaborate with Global Real Estate, HR Operations, and Legal to develop and document employee experience and crisis management procedures.
Monitor crisis alert system and proactively address safety events in partnership with key stakeholders.
Develop and maintain Employee Value Proposition and employee recognition program.
Oversee quarterly reporting and compliance document for corporate employee health and safety.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in HR, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
